DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the feasibility and advantages of using pressurized perfluorocarbon liquid (PCL) perfusion to remove vitreous during suction-cutting 23 GA vitrectomy using a dual, dynamic drive (3D)technology, in complicated retinal detachment surgeries.
DOC.brief_title: Pressurized PPV 23GA Vitrectomy in Complicated Diabetic Tractional Retinal Detachment
DOC.criteria: Complicated retinal detachment with no more than 6months of evolution Retinal detachments of more than 6 months of evolution No light perception
